tacticulous.game.domain

Class BattleMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • tacticulous.game.domain.BattleMap

  • public class BattleMap
extends Object
    Basically a square container grid for tiles.
    Author:
    O

    • Constructor Detail

      • BattleMap

        public BattleMap(int size,
         int random)
        Constructor which randomises terrain movement costs.
        Parameters:
        size - width and height of map, must be 3 or higher
        random - how much the terrain varies. 0 means no variation. Must be non-negetive.

      • BattleMap

        public BattleMap(int[][] map)
        Constructor which uses an int array to determine tile movement costs.
        Parameters:
        map - must be a square array of size 3 or higher with positive numbers.

    • Method Detail

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the width and height (in tiles) of the battlemap.
        Returns:

      • legit

        public boolean legit(int... check)
        Checks if provided integer or integers are within map boundaries.
        Parameters:
        check - integers to be checked
        Returns:
        false if any integer is outside map boundaries.

      • getTile

        public Tile getTile(int x,
           int y)
        Returns the tile located in give coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -
        Returns:
        tile located in give coordinates.

      • copy

        public BattleMap copy()
        Makes a copy of the battlemap. Does not copy units in tiles, only terrain. Used by AI round simulator.
        Returns:
        a copy of the battlemap.
